The client shared with S that Family Promise had her car towed to a shop to get a diagnosis on it and she stated that they agree to pay for half of the car. She stated that she wants to learn more about finances and improving her relationships. She stated that there isnt anything that she would change about the program at this time. S plans to help her create a plan to get that paid down.  She completed her mindset journaling, skillsline modules and financial literacy homeowork.
